title: ssh
description: The SSH command represents a command that is intended to be processed via an SSH connection. In addition to the inherited properties, this section defines the following additional properties that are valid for this type. Either the 'command' property or the 'command_b64' property MUST be present.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be 'ssh'.

command.description:
A simple string-based SSH command. A command that has quoted values or other characters including spacing or carriage returns that are significant and thus need to be escaped SHOULD use the 'command_b64' property instead. 

The value of this property if present MUST be a valid ssh command.

command_b64.description:
A complex command that can not be encoded as a simple string and thus MUST be base64 encoded (see section 4 of [RFC 4648]). 

The value of this property if present MUST be a valid ssh command.
